content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL with warning "out of fuel"; furnace_source holds 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS with warning "no ingredients to smelt"; fuel inventory contains 2 units of coal and furnace_result holds 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs; status: NO_POWER, research set to automation, electrical_id updated to 7944.
- ElectricityGroup (id=7944) connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5) and (10.5, 7.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position(2.5, 21.5) for power generation; status: NOT_CONNECTED with warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]; connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) for steam production; status: NO_FUEL with warning "out of fuel"; fluid_box holds approximately 200 units of water at 15°; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); steam output point at (-7.5, 24.5); fluid_system updated to [29004].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction; status: WORKING; connection point at (-9.5, 23.5); fluid_box holds 100 units of water at 15°; fluid_system updated to [29004].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=29004 at position(-6.5, 20.5) – status: WORKING.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=29005 at position(-2.5, 20.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=29006 at position(-0.5, 21.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=29011 at position(-3.5, 23.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=29010 at position(-7.5, 25.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=29015 at position(3.5, 25.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=29014 at position(2.5, 24.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=29017 at position(-0.5, 28.5) – status: EMPTY.
- Note: Multiple connection attempts using various fluid_system IDs failed to connect the steam engine.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Incorrect Fluid System Identifier Usage:
  - Validate the active fluid_system identifier before attempting a connection. Repeated use of outdated IDs (e.g., 28660, 28703, 28746, 28789, 28832, 28875, 28918, 28961) led to unsuccessful connection attempts. Adjust to the currently active identifier ([29004] for the working PipeGroup) to ensure proper connections.

• Inflexible Pipeline Stabilization Waiting:
  - Replace fixed waiting periods with dynamic connectivity checks. Relying on static delays (10 seconds) has consistently failed to secure pipeline readiness before retrying the connection.
